name: Help with assassin/ninja/stealthy monk type toon.
author: Kastelholm

posts.author: Kastelholm
posts.content:
1) PvM or PvP - Mainly PVM but preferably able to do PVP as well.

2) Level cap - 30 max level, 16 soft cap.

3) Race preference - This one is a human whom I'm trying to save.

4) Class preference - Currently 3 levels rogue & 3 levels monk, ready to level once more but if I take anything but monk I wont be able to take more monk levels.

5) Melee preference - Dual KAMA & stealth attack as a rogue.

6) Range preference - Going for dex but no ranged considered.

7) Weapon preference - Focused on KAMA on this one.

8) Maximum item enhancement - Level 2 stats & ac is easy, level 4 is doable but expensive and alot to grind for.

9) Spellcasting - None besides rogues UMD.

10) Custom factors - If I switch from monk now I wont be able to take more levels in monk.


In short, been playing this character for a few days and just recently found out that if I leave MONK class I wont be able to level up monk anymore.
I was following this build: requesting-build-arelith-ninja-rogue-mo ... 54721.html
So everything is according to that up to lvl 6. Can anything be done to save this?
Really fit the background idea of my character.

Current stats:
10 - 19 - 12 - 14 - 10 - 8

posts.author: Grimnir
posts.content:
Just keep going Monk until 6, or even 8 to preserve BAB. Then hit 20 as 12Rog/8Monk. 1 lvl SD and rest Rogue. Be sure to qualify for Epic Dodge at 27.
